item.title: New MMouse Function REQUEST!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Here’s a good example of a MMouse function by Stupid3000 and modified a little.

Procedure MMouse(MouseX, MouseY, RanX, RanY : Integer);
Begin
     RandX := MouseX + Random(RanX);
     RandY := MouseY + Random(RanY);
     MoveMouseSmoothEx(RandX+1, RandY, 2, 4, 5, 20, 10);
End;

That will move the mouse ALMOST humanlike to wherever. A better MMouse procedure would be for a mouse to go slowly to the destination but, as it is heading toward the x and y coordinates, it should be going at a fast speed, then slowing down toward the destination until it touches the right spot.

Is that possible? It’s gotta be. If it’s made, it should definitely go in SRL.

Read full topic
